name: Manuka
description:
MANUKA! Platformer made for GameJam #zostanwdomurobgry

"In our game we wanted to use the message "reconstruction" to show the problem of the decreasing number of bees around the world, which are a key element of our ecosystem. Showing a little hero who is struggling with a huge forest to do the impossible is aimed at showing the player how potentially a small and invisible thing is of great importance. We  also wanted to outline the problem of pollution."

Team:

  • Maciej - Programming/Level Design/Sound
  • Kacper - Programming/Level Design
  • Karolina - Graphics/Level Design
